overview:
Empire Advertising is located in Ft. Lauderdale serving the Broward county, Miami, and Ft. Lauderdale areas. We specialize in effective and far-reaching marketing campaigns, creative and interactive communication media, public relations management and corporate identity branding.

Empire is well established and using its initial success to grow a large portfolio of contracted clientele. Empire offers its clients a ‘life-cycle driven’ approach to advertising based on a strategic understanding of the long-term visions and short-term goals.

Empire Advertising is committed to the continued growth both territorially and personally. Through that commitment, experience, and expertise. We have established a business relationship with our clients that is unparalleled, and with our team, it will last a lifetime!
